DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; NOBODY HOME
DOC.TEXT: While Roberto Baggio was busy leading his team to triumph , his villa in northern Italy was visited by burglars.They were chased off by his sister ' s German_shepherd . " They must have been foreign burglars , " was the comment of a television commentator Wednesday night . " All the Italian burglars would have been watching the game. "
